name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-football-stats
title: Football Stats
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension allows user to choose one of the top five European Football League to get information about current team standing. The data is retrieved using REST API provided by - https://api.football-data.org
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension allows user to choose one of the top five European Football League to get information about current team standing. The data is retrieved using REST API provided by - https://api.football-data.org

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.

references.name: Adaptive Card Documentation
references.description: Detailed documentation on Adaptive Cards including the Adaptive Card designer.

references.name: Adaptive Card Extension Design Guidance
references.description: Design guidance for laying out Adaptive Card Extensions.
